constituent: hoarse, mouth, mexican bandit, muchacho, siesta, sun, day, aroma, bound up, spoon, sitting on the ground
heisigStory: When the muchacho on siesta looks up at you and opens his mouth to talk, his voice is so hoarse that you cannot understand him.
koohiiStory1: If you have a siesta with your mouthopen, you will wake up with a hoarse voice.
koohiiStory2: After taking a siesta, you find that your mouth is hoarse (after all you ARE thirsty remember).
myStory: thều thào. miệng hỏi tại sao nho nhỏ thì thào
